name: Premium Scottish Salmon Dog Food
description: High-quality dog food made with sustainably sourced Scottish salmon, rich in omega-3 fatty acids for a healthy coat and skin.
details: Complete nutrition for adult dogs. Contains 60% salmon, sweet potato, and essential vitamins. No artificial colours or preservatives. Grain-free formula suitable for sensitive stomachs.

name: Natural Cat Scratching Post
description: Handcrafted scratching post made from sustainable Scottish timber with natural sisal rope, perfect for keeping your cat's claws healthy.
details: Height: 75cm. Base: 40x40cm. Made from locally sourced pine. Natural sisal rope wrapping. Stable weighted base. Top perch with soft cushion.

name: Organic Rabbit Food Mix
description: Nutritionally balanced organic mix of timothy hay, herbs, and vegetables specifically formulated for rabbits and guinea pigs.
details: 2kg bag. Certified organic ingredients. High fibre content supports digestive health. Contains dandelion, nettle, and chamomile. No added sugars or artificial ingredients.

name: Luxury Heated Pet Bed
description: Energy-efficient heated pet bed with removable, washable cover. Perfect for keeping your pet warm during Scottish winters.
details: Available in Medium (60x45cm) and Large (80x60cm). Low voltage heating element (12V). Thermostat controlled. Machine washable outer cover. Memory foam base. Energy rating A++.

name: Interactive Dog Toy Bundle
description: Set of 5 durable, interactive toys designed to stimulate your dog's mind and keep them entertained for hours.
details: Includes: treat-dispensing ball, rope tug toy, squeaky plush toy, puzzle feeder, and floating fetch toy. Non-toxic materials. Suitable for dogs of all sizes. Helps reduce anxiety and boredom.

name: Wild Bird Seed Mix
description: Premium blend of seeds, nuts, and dried mealworms to attract and nourish Scottish garden birds throughout the year.
details: 5kg bag. Attracts robins, blue tits, goldfinches, and more. Contains sunflower hearts, nyjer seed, peanut granules, and dried mealworms. No fillers or waste. Supports RSPB conservation efforts.

name: Cat Activity Tunnel
description: Collapsible play tunnel with crinkle material and hanging toys to encourage exercise and play.
details: Length: 120cm, Diameter: 25cm. Waterproof nylon material. Built-in crinkle paper for sound. Two hanging feather toys. Folds flat for storage.

name: Natural Hamster Bedding
description: Chemical-free paper bedding made from recycled materials, super absorbent and dust-free.
details: 1.5kg bag. 99.5% dust-free. Absorbs 3x its weight. Biodegradable and compostable. Ideal for hamsters, gerbils, and mice.

name: Premium Dog Leash Set
description: Handcrafted leather leash and collar set, made in Scotland from full-grain leather with solid brass fittings.
details: Available in three sizes (S, M, L). 180cm leash with padded handle. Solid brass D-rings and clips. Vegetable-tanned leather. Will darken and soften with age.

name: Aquarium Starter Kit
description: Complete aquarium kit including tank, filter, heater, and LED lighting system.
details: 60L glass tank (60x30x35cm). Internal filter (200L/h). Adjustable heater (50W). Energy-efficient LED light. Includes water conditioner and fish food starter pack.

name: Chicken Coop Feeder
description: Weather-resistant automatic feeder suitable for up to 12 chickens, with rain cover and anti-waste design.
details: 12kg capacity. UV-resistant plastic. Adjustable flow control. Prevents waste and contamination. Easy to fill and clean. Suitable for pellets and mixed grain.

name: Cat Grooming Kit
description: Professional-quality grooming tools including slicker brush, deshedding tool, nail clippers, and comb.
details: Stainless steel tools with ergonomic handles. Slicker brush for removing loose fur. Deshedding tool reduces shedding by up to 90%. Safety-stop nail clippers. Includes storage case.
